info.title: Scheduling
info.description: Unified OpenAPI specification for scheduling domain

get.description:
Get a list of resource types for a business, with pagination

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted resource types in the response

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

post.description:
Create a new resource type.

Available for **Staff Tokens**

name.description: The name of the resource type

services.description: Array of service UIDs that require this resource type

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to create resource types (requires account.settings.manage permission)

get.description:
Get a specific resource type by UID

Available for **Staff Tokens**

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Not authorized to access this resource type

put.description:
Update a resource type's properties

Available for **Staff Tokens**

name.description: The name of the resource type

services.description: Array of service UIDs that require this resource type

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to update this resource type (requires account.settings.manage permission)

delete.description:
Delete a resource type. Deletes all associated resources.

Available for **Staff Tokens**

200.description: Resource type deleted successfully. **Note:** All associated resources are automatically deleted (cascade deletion)

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to delete this resource type (requires account.settings.manage permission)

get.description:
Get all resources, with pagination and filtering by resource type or service

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100

parameters.name: resource_type_uid
parameters.description: Filter by resource type UID(s). Accepts single value or array of values. Example: ?resource_type_uid=abc123 or ?resource_type_uid=abc123&resource_type_uid=def456

parameters.name: service_uid
parameters.description: Filter resources by service UID that requires their resource type

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted resources in the response

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Filter by resource UID(s). Accepts single value or array of values. Example: ?uid=abc123 or ?uid=abc123&uid=def456

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

post.description:
Create a new resource

Available for **Staff Tokens**

resource_type_uid.description: The resource type this instance belongs to

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to create resources (requires account.settings.manage permission)

get.description:
Get a specific resource by UID

Available for **Staff Tokens**

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Not authorized to access this resource

put.description:
Update a resource's properties

Available for **Staff Tokens**

resource_type_uid.description: The resource type this instance belongs to

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to update this resource (requires account.settings.manage permission)

delete.description:
Soft-delete a resource

Available for **Staff Tokens**

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to delete this resource (requires account.settings.manage permission)

arrival_window_value.description: Optional for appointment only .Arrival window value is in minutes and limited to 540 (9 hours)

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

interaction_details.description: Address. Required when service location set to: Client will set the address at booking

time_zone.description: Default is set to UTC if not provided

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

booking_id.description: Booking (appointment/event) uid. (Can also be an array for batch cancel)

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

allow_double_booking.description: Should allow overlapping with a different booking if time/duration is changed (True by default)

auto_follow_up_hours.description: How many hours after the booking to send the automatic follow up message

interaction_details.description: Details of the meeting (address/ phone number

meeting_reminder_sms_1.description: Should send the client an SMS with the first reminder

meeting_reminder_sms_2.description: Should send the client an SMS with the second reminder

message.description: A message to be sent to the client after updating the booking

notify_client.description: If true a message about the update with the 'message' field would be sent to the client

padding.description: The padding duration before of the booking

remind_before_in_hours_1.description: How many hours before the booking to send the first reminder

remind_before_in_hours_2.description: How many hours before the booking to send the second reminder

sms_booking_confirmation.description: Should send the client an SMS with the booking confirmation

start_time.description: The start time of the booking in UTC (ISO 8601 format)'

post.description: General availability - Create new time slot

day.description: A number representing the day of the week (0 - sunday, 6 - saturday)

get.description:
Retrieve availability time slots for a specific business within a date range

 **Only available for Directory Tokens**

Retrieve availability time slots for multiple businesses in a directory

 **Only available for Directory Tokens**

parameters.name: scheduling_enabled
parameters.description: Determines whether to return only accounts with online scheduling enabled or disabled. Default: true (returns accounts with online scheduling enabled)

get.description: Retrieve availability slots for scheduling based on specified criteria. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: resource_type_uids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resource type UIDs. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: resource_uids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resource UIDs. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: staff_uids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of staff UIDs. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: slot_duration
parameters.description: Duration of each slot in minutes

parameters.name: slot_interval
parameters.description: Interval between slots in minutes (if relevant)

parameters.name: padding_before
parameters.description: Padding time before each slot in minutes (if relevant)

parameters.name: padding_after
parameters.description: Padding time after each slot in minutes (if relevant)

parameters.name: exclude_booking_uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a booking to exclude from busy slots calculation when determining availability. When provided, the specified booking is temporarily removed from the busy slots list before calculating available time slots. This is essential for rescheduling scenarios where you need to check if the original time slot would be available without the current booking, or for conflict detection when validating potential overlaps. Example: If booking 'abc123' is scheduled from 2:00-3:00 PM and you want to reschedule it, passing exclude_booking_uid=abc123 will show 2:00-3:00 PM as available (assuming no other bookings conflict). If other bookings exist during that time, the slot remains busy.

400.description: Invalid request parameters - missing required parameters or invalid values

404.description: Service or specified resources not found

parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. Max: 100
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Maximum number of records which are returned for the request
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: First record's index in the returned list (e.g. per_page = 10, offset = 1, reords 11 to 20 are returned)
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: If equals to true, returns records from the past only. Otherwise, returns future bookings as well.
parameters.name: passed

parameters.description: Relevant to recurring appointment/event, returns appointment/event attendance which their start_time is bigger than this parameter
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Relevant to recurring appointment/event, returns appointment/event attendance which their start_time is smaller than this parameter
parameters.name: end_time

time_zone.description: Default is set to UTC if not provided

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

parameters.description: New RSVP State. 'confirmed' is the only valid option. any other state is forbidden (return 403)
parameters.name: new_rsvp_state

parameters.description: The id of the event instance
